DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study provide test method deliver nutrition physical activity service weight loss .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Aged 40 64 year . 2 . One CHC visit past 12 month . 3 . Bodymass index ≥30 < 50 . 4 . English speaking . 5 . Access telephone . 6 . A permanent address . 7 . Willingness randomize . 8 . Willingness computer instal home . 1 . Any serious medical condition likely hinder accurate weight measurement , weight loss contraindicate could cause weight loss ( e.g. , cancer ) . 2 . Current diagnosis psychosis bipolar disorder . 3 . Unstable recent onset cardiovascular disease within 6 month presence congestive heart failure 4 . Illness might associate weight change , asthma ( treatment corticosteroid ) , psychosis 5 . Use medication might cause weight gain hypoglycemic oral medicine insulin , antidepressant , weight loss medication . 6 . Unwilling unable provide inform consent . 7 . Receiving disability insurance . 8 . Pregnant nursing past 6 month , plan become pregnant within 12 month . 9 . Enrolled weight loss program study member household enrol study . 10 . Residence outside Marion County , Indiana . 11 . Residence relocation plan within 12 month . 12 . Planned prior bariatric surgery . 13 . Substance abuse . 14 . History treatment eat disorder . 15 . Unstable weight loss gain ≥ 5 % last 3 month .
